Frame Configuration

This page shows the configuration for a CRC and rolling counter within a given XNET Frame.

What do you want to do?

Select Channel Configuration

To select the channel configuration, right click on the add-on instance and select Select Channels from the shortcut menu. Select the data signals in the first view. Select the rolling counter channel and maximum count in the second view. Select the CRC channel in the third view. The rolling counter and the CRC channels will automatically be mapped to the selected channels. All required information for the data channels will be pulled from the database.

Delete

To delete an item, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Delete from the shortcut menu.
